title: Ekko x Jinx
body:
I had a crush on you
...Until you start talking to the gun!

replies.body: So cute my teeth almost fell out.  ;)

> [{quoted}](name=Bioluminescence,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=FpFFApYw,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-05-15T02:36:27.973+0000)
>
> So cute my teeth almost fell out.  ;)

Hey could you tell someone that there are millions of users that cannot access to the Store? THANKS. Apparently no one in Riot is replying to the dozens of threads about this in the big section.

> [{quoted}](name=OkamotoSenpai,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=FpFFApYw,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-05-15T03:44:33.702+0000)
>
> Hey could you tell someone that there are millions of users that cannot access to the Store? THANKS. Apparently no one in Riot is replying to the dozens of threads about this in the big section.

I know they're aware of it - it's on the[ service status page](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) that they're working on it right now.  I'm really sorry it's down for you (and the other players) just now :( :( :( 

> Network Operations – 11:13 AM
We're aware that some players are still experiencing a black screen when loading the store and are working to resolve this issue.

> [{quoted}](name=Bioluminescence,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=FpFFApYw,comment-id=000000000001,timestamp=2015-05-15T04:21:19.912+0000)
>
> I know they're aware of it - it's on the[ service status page](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) that they're working on it right now.  I'm really sorry it's down for you (and the other players) just now :( :( :( 
> We're aware that some players are still experiencing a black screen when loading the store and are working to resolve this issue.

I can only hope the other client issues are being worked on, and sorry for nagging and im sure you guys know but according to my client I can only use clarity I own no champions I have no friends my runes are 10x the size(they better do 10x as much >:[ ) and I cant buy items(item sets)

Hey could you so kindly scroll up and press "service status." 

Yeah, they know. 

Get over it.
He is between 16-19 and jinx is somewhere between 20-30.

> [{quoted}](name=Chromatic Eagle,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=FpFFApYw,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-05-15T03:24:27.380+0000)
>
> How old is he again?

He's about as old as Vi and Jinx. You have to remember this: his power is GOING BACK IN TIME. For every time he's seen doing something perfectly, he's already gone back any number of times perfecting the act.

Hell, he might even be older than them both.
Just because he goes back in time doesn't mean it affects his age. We don't know the effects of that device.

> [{quoted}](name=Chromatic Eagle,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=FpFFApYw,comment-id=000100020000,timestamp=2015-05-16T02:03:47.183+0000)
>
> Just because he goes back in time doesn't mean it affects his age. We don't know the effects of that device.

Well, the current rumor is that he no longer ages because of it.

Also I just now realized how backwards my logic is lol he wouldn't look younger he'd look older.

> [{quoted}](name=Etherwolf,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=FpFFApYw,comment-id=0001000200000000,timestamp=2015-05-16T06:19:37.481+0000)
>
> Well, the current rumor is that he no longer ages because of it.
> 
> Also I just now realized how backwards my logic is lol he wouldn't look younger he'd look older.

Nah, his body goes back in time, his mind doesn't. So outside, he'll look young, inside (his mind..and possibly wear/injuries/*cancer...?*) he'll keep aging. Plus whatever strain the device itself puts on him..

> [{quoted}](name=Chromatic Eagle,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=FpFFApYw,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-05-15T03:24:27.380+0000)
>
> How old is he again?

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Time_dilation

TL;DR- **NOONE KNOWSSSS**
(except maybe {{champion:432}}{{champion:26}} {{champion:161}})

- More important question on the SHIP: Does being part of the same genetic mutation experiment make you brother and sister?
I mean the picture on the wall had Vi and Ekko on it...and there's a good bit of speculation that Vi and Jinx are related/and/or connected by being part of the same experiment. Meaning Ekko, Jinx, Vi, and ~~Augmented Singed~~ **Not** Singed, are all one big ~~happy~~ *mad* family.

> [{quoted}](name=Illuminate I,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=FpFFApYw,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-05-15T10:41:30.771+0000)
>
> Is this really the lore?

It has nothing to do about the lore. It's just an interaction taunt that Ekko said to Jinx. 
"I had a crush on her... But then you started talking to the gun" 
I just drew this because I just imagine how they would look if they actually started dating., and personally I think they're cute together

I really hope Ekko just thinks Jinx is nuts.

Like she's a gang member that just went to far. I like that idea.

> [{quoted}](name=CircusT4ffy,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=FpFFApYw,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-05-15T13:13:22.818+0000)
>
> I really hope Ekko just thinks Jinx is nuts.
> 
> Like she's a gang member that just went to far. I like that idea.

Ekko **had** a crush on her, until he found out that she's a psycho. I just drew this because I personally think they look cute together
